title: Are Harry Potter books worth collecting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course they are. You should go ahead and add them to your library or collection of books. Not only is it popular all over the world, but am sure more people around you who have not read the books would appreciate reading them too. And if you have kids, siblings or just young people around you, it would be a great disservice to deny them the lovely experience they will accrue by reading these magnificent books.
